nodes.text: After the Battle of Endor, a mural depicting the Spectres, the white Loth-wolf, and a gray Loth-wolf was erected in Capital City on Lothal by Mandalorian Sabine Wren. Sabine Wren visited the mural, where she met with Ahsoka Tano who had arrived in her T-6 shuttle, to begin their search for Ezra Bridger.
